text: Dar on [xona], nisonahoi ravsan, [az cumla] maqomi Iʙrohim ast va [digar in ki] har ki doxili on [haram] savad, dar amon xohad ʙud; va ʙar mardum [vociʙ] ast, ki ʙaroi [iʙodati] Alloh taolo qasdi on xona kunand [alʙatta, ʙaroi] kase, ki tavonoii [moli va cismi] raftan ʙa suji onro dorad; va har ki [ʙa farizai hac] kufr varzad, ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo az cahonijon ʙenijoz ast
